default.name: Default
default.summaryPrompt:
Analyze the commits and provide a concise but comprehensive daily summary of what was accomplished. 
    Focus on the big picture of what features were worked on, what problems were solved, and the general direction of development.
    Keep the tone professional but conversational.
default.decisionsPrompt:
Review the commits and identify the key architectural, technical, or product decisions made during development.
    Format as a bullet list of decisions. Each decision should be clear and actionable.
default.insightsPrompt:
Based on the commits, identify key insights, learnings, design patterns used, and performance considerations.
    Categorize each insight as one of: design-decision, pattern-used, performance-insight, or learning.
    Return as JSON array with type, title, and description for each.

technical-deep-dive.name: Technical Deep Dive
technical-deep-dive.description: Focus on technical implementation details and code quality
technical-deep-dive.summaryPrompt:
Provide a technical summary of the commits focusing on implementation details, algorithms, data structures, and code quality improvements.
    Include specific technologies and frameworks used.
    Highlight any refactoring or optimization work done.
technical-deep-dive.decisionsPrompt:
Identify technical decisions made in the commits including architecture choices, API design decisions, database schema changes, and infrastructure modifications.
    Explain the rationale behind each decision.
technical-deep-dive.insightsPrompt:
Analyze the commits for technical insights including design patterns applied, potential performance bottlenecks, code quality issues addressed, and best practices implemented.
    Categorize each as: design-decision, pattern-used, performance-insight, or learning.

security-focused.name: Security Focused
security-focused.description: Emphasis on security, vulnerabilities, and data protection
security-focused.summaryPrompt:
Summarize the commits with a focus on security-related changes, vulnerability fixes, authentication updates, and data protection improvements.
    Highlight any security reviews or hardening efforts.
security-focused.decisionsPrompt: Extract security-related decisions from the commits including authentication mechanisms chosen, encryption implementations, access control changes, and vulnerability remediation strategies.
security-focused.insightsPrompt:
Identify security insights and concerns including authentication patterns, authorization implementations, data handling practices, third-party dependency updates, and potential security risks.
    Categorize as: design-decision, pattern-used, performance-insight, or learning.

executive-summary.name: Executive Summary
executive-summary.description: High-level business impact and milestone tracking
executive-summary.summaryPrompt:
Provide a high-level executive summary of what was accomplished, focusing on business value, user-facing features, and strategic milestones.
    Use non-technical language suitable for stakeholders and management.
    Include impact assessment when possible.
executive-summary.decisionsPrompt:
Highlight key business and product decisions made during this period including feature prioritization, scope changes, and product direction shifts.
    Keep explanation concise and business-focused.
executive-summary.insightsPrompt:
Extract insights related to product progress, team velocity, feature completion, and strategic direction.
    Categorize as: design-decision, pattern-used, performance-insight, or learning.

performance-analysis.name: Performance Analysis
performance-analysis.description: Focus on performance optimizations and scalability improvements
performance-analysis.summaryPrompt:
Summarize the commits with emphasis on performance optimizations, scalability improvements, and resource efficiency enhancements.
    Include metrics and benchmarks where mentioned in commits.
    Highlight any bottlenecks addressed.
performance-analysis.decisionsPrompt: Identify performance-related decisions including caching strategies, database optimization choices, load balancing decisions, and resource allocation changes.
performance-analysis.insightsPrompt:
Analyze performance insights including optimization techniques applied, scalability improvements, performance trade-offs made, and monitoring enhancements.
    Categorize as: design-decision, pattern-used, performance-insight, or learning.

testing-quality.name: Testing & Quality
testing-quality.description: Emphasis on testing, test coverage, and quality assurance
testing-quality.summaryPrompt:
Summarize the commits focusing on testing improvements, test coverage changes, quality assurance efforts, and bug fixes.
    Include information about test types added (unit, integration, e2e) and testing framework updates.
testing-quality.decisionsPrompt: Extract decisions related to testing strategy including testing approach choices, testing tools selected, test coverage targets, and quality gates implemented.
testing-quality.insightsPrompt:
Identify quality and testing insights including testing patterns adopted, quality improvements made, test automation enhancements, and areas needing more test coverage.
    Categorize as: design-decision, pattern-used, performance-insight, or learning.

dependency-audit.name: Dependency Audit
dependency-audit.description: Track dependency updates, upgrades, and external library changes
dependency-audit.summaryPrompt:
Analyze the commits for dependency management including package updates, library upgrades, new dependencies added, and removed dependencies.
    Highlight version changes and any breaking changes.
dependency-audit.decisionsPrompt: Identify decisions related to dependencies including framework upgrades chosen, library selections made, compatibility decisions, and deprecation handling.
dependency-audit.insightsPrompt:
Extract insights about dependency usage including upgrade impacts, compatibility issues, new patterns from updated libraries, and technical debt related to dependencies.
    Categorize as: design-decision, pattern-used, performance-insight, or learning.
